title: Crowd CLI config
description: Configuration for the Crowd monorepo manager

currentVersion.description:
The current version of your packages.
Defaults to 0.0.0

gitRemote.description:
The git remote to use for auto-updating.
Defaults to origin

prereleaseDistTag.description:
The npm distribution tag your prereleases will use.
Defaults to next

commitMessageTemplate.description:
The message your version commits will have.
The placeholder %v will be replaced with your version number.
Defaults to %v (the version number will be the whole commit message)

outOfDateBehavior.description:
What should be done when your local git branch is out of date with the changes from the remote.
Defaults to ignore
